== Introduction ==

The Ubuntu-OS X team is dedicated to simplifying the user-environment for avid Mac users. 
It is designed to changing themes, icons, and nautilus configuration for the non-technical users, while keeping the Ubuntu/Linux purpose of "free and open".

=== Members ===
These are our members
<nowiki>[[http://launchpad.net/~spaz926|Spaz926 - Jeffrey Carpenter]]</nowiki>

== Future Hopes ==

To design a user-friendly environment for avid Mac users by editing the themes, icons, and nautilus configurations.
